headline:
CHECK BILLS ONLINE
Dial *152*00#
steps: Ingiza nambari ya akaunti yako ya MWAUWASA.

headline:
PAY VIA M-Pesa
Dial *150*00#
steps: Dial *150*00# to start payment via M-Pesa

headline:
PAY VIA tiGO-Pesa
Dial *150*01#
steps: Dial *150*01# to start payment via tiGO-Pesa

headline:
PAY VIA airtel Money
Dial *150*60#
steps: Dial *150*60# to start payment via airtel Money

headline:
PAY VIA Halo-Pesa
Dial *150*60#
steps: Dial *150*60# to start payment via Halo-Pesa

headline: Pay at MWAUWASA Offices
steps:
You can pay at any MWAUWASA Office, during office hours.
Check the "Contact Us" page and click "Address" to get directions to the MWAUWASA Office nearest you.
